name: Apple Strudel Popcorn
description: This apple strudel popcorn is my new favorite treat. It's sweet, crispy, and so easy to make. Make a large bowl and snuggle up on the couch!

recipeInstructions.text: Put enough oil in a medium saucepan so that the bottom is completely covered. Turn the heat on high. Add the sugar and allow to caramelize. Then add the kernels and the cinnamon.
recipeInstructions.name: Put enough oil in a medium saucepan so that the bottom is completely covered. Turn the heat on high. Add the sugar and allow to caramelize. Then add the kernels and the cinnamon.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the lid on top and wait for the kernels to begin to pop. Give the pot a little swirl, so all the kernels are coated by the hot oil.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the lid on top and wait for the kernels to begin to pop. Give the pot a little swirl, so all the kernels are coated by the hot oil.

recipeInstructions.text: When the popping slows, turn off the heat. Immediately transfer the popcorn to a large bowl. Stir in the agave and add the apple chips, the raisins, and sprinkle the popcorn with some  more cinnamon. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: When the popping slows, turn off the heat. Immediately transfer the popcorn to a large bowl. Stir in the agave and add the apple chips, the raisins, and sprinkle the popcorn with some  more cinnamon. Enjoy!
